articles.description: Leeds suffered a calamitous first half, conceding 28 points and eventually losing 40-16 to Castleford in the Challenge Cup
articles.content: There is a moment in time when this slump for Leeds will come to an end. The only issue for the Rhinos and their next head coach is that moment does not appear to be on the horizon. The Challenge Cup… [+4168 chars]

articles.title: Port Vale 2-0 Sutton United - BBC
articles.description: Jamie Proctor's stunning strike helps Port Vale to a 2-0 win at home to fellow League Two play-off hopefuls Sutton United.
articles.content:
Jamie Proctor's stunning strike helped Port Vale to a 2-0 win at home to fellow League Two play-off hopefuls Sutton.

articles.title: United Rugby Championship: Sharks 5-21 Edinburgh - Scottish side claim landmark win - BBC
articles.description: Returning Scotland international Blair Kinghorn crosses twice as Edinburgh subdue Sharks to earn the first United Rugby Championship win by a northern hemisphere side in South Africa.
articles.content:
Blair Kinghorn (left) and Emiliano Boffelli scored Edinburgh's tries in a memorable away victory

articles.description: Kyle Lafferty scores twice as Kilmarnock stretch their lead at the top of the Scottish Championship to four points.
articles.content:
Kyle Lafferty has scored seven goals for Kilmarnock
